text: Susianna "Susi" Kentikian (born September 11, 1987) is a woman boxer from Germany. She was born in Yerevan, Armenian SSR, but she left the country together with her family when she was five years old, because of the Nagorno- Karabakh War. Kentikian has lived in Hamburg since 1996 and has signed a contract with the Hamburg boxing promoter Spotlight Boxing. Kentikian is the current world champion with the boxing organizations WBA and WIBF in the flyweight weight class. == Other websites == * Kentikian.de, official homepage * Susianna Kentikian , Spotlight Boxing homepage * Professional boxing record for Susianna Kentikian from Boxrec.com * Susianna Kentikian Biography at WomenBoxing.com Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Armenian boxers
title: Susianna Kentikian
